definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: Nineveh, capital of Assyria (As. Ninâ, Ninua, Ninû, cf. Schr:COT Gloss. Dl:Par 260);—Ge 10:11, Ge 10:12 (J), 2Ki 19:36 = Is 37:37, Na 1:1, Na 2:9, Na 3:7, Zep 2:13, Jon 1:2, Jon 3:3, Jon 3:4, Jon 3:5, Jon 3:6, Jon 3:7, called [[הָעִיר הַגְּדוֹלָה]] v:Jon 3:3 Jon 4:11 (cf. Jon 3:4.); LXX Nineuh, LXXL Nineui. Site on E. bank of Tigris marked by mounds Neby Yunus and Kuyundjik, opposite Mosul. Cf. Layard:Nineveh and its Remains, 1848; Monuments of N. 1849 f. Billerbeck u. Jeremias:BAS iii. 1 (1895), 107 ff.
